I have an apprentice

Eric Smith

2010-09-24

After 3 long years of searching, and several rejections (you know who you are), I finally have an apprentice. I’ve asked him to blog every day on his apprenticeship, and since I don’t like asking people to do things I won’t do I’ll also be blogging about my first experience as a mentor here. That’s not to say I won’t also blog here, but the daily entries will be over at the tumblr.

His blog is at http://blog.degutis.org/.
